specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Natural > Silk Silk can be damaged by sweat and other acidic substances. It may also fade if left in the sun for too long. Store it in a place without direct sunlight.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Bridal, Dresses, Blouses, Partywear
